Protected Member Functions

virtual void idle_ready ()
 from idle to active contending (new work to do)
 
virtual void releasing_ready ()
 from active non contending to active contending (more work)
 
virtual void ready_executing ()
 from active contending to executing (dispatching)
 
virtual void executing_ready ()
 from executing to active contenting (preemption)
 
virtual void executing_releasing ()
 from executing to active non contending (no more work)
 
virtual void releasing_idle ()
 from active non contending to idle (no lag)
 
virtual void executing_recharging ()
 from executing to recharging (budget exhausted)
 
virtual void recharging_ready ()
 from recharging to active contending (budget recharged)
 
virtual void recharging_idle ()
 from recharging to active contending (budget recharged)

void callEndRun ( )
staticinherited

The same as callNewRun(), but it is called at the end of every run.

See Also
callEndRun

Definition at line 89 of file entity.cpp.

void callNewRun ( )
staticinherited

Returns the pointer to the entity with the specified name or NULL if such entity does not exists. Recursively calls newRun() on every entity in the system. It is automatically called at the beginning of every run by the Simulation class. Not to be called by the user!! In a future release will be hidden.

See Also
callNewRun

Definition at line 69 of file entity.cpp.

Tick changeBudget ( const Tick &  new_budget)
virtual

Dynamically changes the budget.

Parameters
new_budgetthe new budget. Can be higher or lower than the current one
Returns
the function returns the time at which the new budget has been imposed. Usually, an increase in the budget is immediately enforced, so it returns the current time. A decrease in the budget, instead, cannot be enforced immediately, so the function will return the time in the future when the new budget has been enforced.

Implements Server.

Definition at line 131 of file server.cpp.

void endRun ( )
virtual

Reset the entity status at the end of every run. This function is called automatically at the end of every run, and its job consists in resetting the entity status (for example closing files, etc.) Warning: in endRun() is not permitted to create/destroy new entity objects.

Implements Entity.

Definition at line 376 of file server.hpp.

void newRun ( )
virtual

Resets the entity status at the beginning of every run. This function is called automatically at the beginning of every run, and its job consists in initializing the entity status. Warning: in newRun() is not permitted to create/destroy new entity objects.

Implements Entity.

Definition at line 24 of file pollingserver.cpp.

void onArrival ( AbsRTTask *  t)
virtualinherited

Inherited from AbsKernel.

This function is invoked every time an arrival event is triggered for this object. In periodic servers, arrivals are periodic (e.g. in Polling Server), in other servers they can be aperiodic (e.g. CBS or Grub).

Implements AbsKernel.

void onDlineMiss ( Event *  )
inherited

This function is invoked if the server deadline is missed. Should never happen! This will throw an exception.

virtual void refreshExec ( double  ,
double   
)
inlinevirtualinherited

Function inherited from AbsRTTask. It refreshes the state of the executing task when a change of the CPU speed occurs. In this class, this function does nothing.

virtual double setSpeed ( double  )
inlinevirtualinherited

Function inherited from AbsKernel. It sets the speed of the CPU accordingly to the new system load, and returns the new speed. For this class, it does nothing and returns 0.
